name: Sanicur Handzeep sensitive
composition:
Ingredients: Aqua, 
Sodium Laureth Sulfate, 
Sodium Chloride, 
Glycerin, 
Cocamidopropyl Betaine, 
Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, 
Lactic Acid, 
Parfum, 
Sodium Benzoate, 
Potassium Sorbate, 
Propylene Glycol, 
Sodium Hydroxide, 
Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract.
